seo.title: CodeFlowBR — Learn to Code Visually | Free Interactive Lessons
seo.description: Learn programming visually and interactively with CodeFlowBR. Free lessons and exercises for Python, JavaScript, C++ and more. Start now.

dialog.loginDesc: Enter your email and password to sign in.

sessionExpired.title: Session expired
sessionExpired.desc: Please sign in again to continue.

banner.proCosts: Pro costs $2/month (USD); your bank will convert to local currency.

common.tryAgainSoon: Please try again in a moment.
common.somethingWentWrongTryAgain: Something went wrong. Please try again.

alreadyPro.title: Already Pro

hero.subtitle: Master programming concepts step by step.

header.title: Pricing Plans

value.premiumDesc: Advanced debugging, AI-assisted fixes, snapshots, and curated learning tracks to accelerate development.

everythingPro.title: Everything Pro: Faster debugging, smarter code
everythingPro.desc: Subscribe to Pro and get the full suite: advanced debugger, AI-powered fixes, snapshots, profiler, private playgrounds, and curated learning tracks to accelerate your development.

billing.title: Billing
billing.desc: Payments are handled by a third-party provider. If checkout fails, please contact the site administrator or check server logs — sensitive configuration details are not shown here.

store.title: Store
store.subtitle: Centralized purchases for items and extras
store.xpStoreSubtitle: Spend your hard-earned FlowCoins on power-ups and cosmetics.

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: Full access to Pro features, tools and premium content.

balance.subtitle: Your current balance • Earn 1 coin per 50 XP

dailyStreak.title: Daily Streak

notEnough.title: Not enough FlowCoins

hero.title: Battle Pass CodeFlow
hero.subtitle: Unlock 50 tiers of premium rewards, legendary avatars, golden frames, and animated name effects. Progress as you study and practice daily challenges.
hero.premiumIncludes: Premium pass includes all gold rewards.
hero.signInToSave: Sign in to save your tier progress.

tierGrid.title: Tier Map (1-50)
tierGrid.premiumUnlocks: Premium track unlocks all gold items

cta.title: All gold rewards for only $5
cta.desc: Includes 50 tiers, legendary avatars, animated frames, name effects, and 25k+ coins in rewards. No subscription — one-time seasonal purchase.

activated.title: Battle Pass activated
activated.desc: Your premium rewards are now unlocked.

toast.mustSignInToBuy: You must be signed in to buy the Battle Pass.

header.title: Pro Learning
header.subtitle: Hands-on advanced problems with guided solutions and expert explanations.

proChallenges.title: Pro Challenges
proChallenges.desc: Hands-on advanced problems with guided solutions and expert explanations.

aiInspector.title: AI Code Inspector
aiInspector.desc: Automatic analysis with optimization suggestions, warnings, and algorithm explanations.

playground.title: Pro Playground
playground.desc: A private, fast playground to prototype ideas and reproduce bugs.
playground.placeholder: Write or paste code to experiment.

locked.title: Pro Exercises Locked
locked.desc: Upgrade to Pro to unlock all exercises.

labs.subtitle: Quick interactive demos that showcase Pro features and workflows.

profiler.title: Code Profiler
profiler.hint: Use the profiler to measure function performance.

whatToWatch.title: What to Watch
whatToWatch.item2: Heavy allocations and memory churn that cause pauses.
whatToWatch.item3: CPU-bound hotspots and I/O wait queues to optimize.

inspector.title: Variable Inspector
inspector.hint: Use the inspector to explore object structure, values and metadata.
inspector.pastePlaceholder: Paste JSON or object to inspect.
inspector.focusFallback: Select a value in the tree to inspect it
inspector.previewFallback: Select a path in the inspector tree to preview its value.

howToUse.title: How to Use the Inspector
howToUse.item1: Click keys or indices to explore nested values.
howToUse.item2: Use the search box to find properties or values quickly.
howToUse.item3: Tip: paste JSON to inspect objects or debug API responses.

interpreter.title: Interpreter
interpreter.item1: Shows the selected value and its type.
interpreter.item2: Quickly copy values or paths for debugging.
interpreter.item3: Use the inspector to reproduce and diagnose issues faster.

debugger.desc: The Pro debugger is available to subscribers — try one free use to see its value.

js.noFunction: Could not find a function to test.

form.contentPlaceholder: What did you learn today? Any insights or 'aha' moments?

sandbox.title: Sandbox
sandbox.subtitle: Paste your full code and see how it runs line by line.

suggestion.removeDebug: Remove debug output before sharing (e.g., console.log / print).
suggestion.semicolon: This line looks like it might be missing a semicolon.
suggestion.unusedVar: Variable "{{name}}" is assigned but never used.

sandbox.nonJsNote: JavaScript is fully supported for real execution now. For other languages we will add an engine (static checks + step simulation) next.
sandbox.notSupported: Real step-by-step execution is currently available only for JavaScript. For other languages, we will add an engine next.
sandbox.doneDesc: Reached the end of your program.
sandbox.narrationEmpty: Press Step or Play to start.
sandbox.outputNonJsNote: Output is shown for JavaScript execution. Other languages are simulated for now.
